item.title: A Different Way to Think About Recursion
item.description: $$‘‘Those\ who\ don’t\ understand\ recursion\ are\ doomed\ to\ repeat\ it.’’$$ If you are in a hurry, you can skip directly to the summary section. Recursion is a simple but very confusing concept. When I first learned about it, I was confused as to how a function can call itself. I was working on some code the other day, and I had to use recursion to solve a problem, and while I was writing the function, I had a realization that changed how I look at recursion.
